amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide by $10 million and to increase funding for Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Defense-Wide by a similar amount to assist in development of solutions to perchlorate contaminated water.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide, by $10 million and to increase funding for Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Defense-Wide, by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Baca amendment (A019) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Baca.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Baca amendment (A019) Failed by voice vote.
